gotchas_discovered.description: Language switching must complete instantly without page reload, requiring proper waiting for state updates
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Tests include appropriate waits for language change to propagate

gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Tests verify both document.dir attribute and document.documentElement.lang

gotchas_discovered.description: API requests must include proper Accept-Language headers for backend to serve correct language
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Tests explicitly verify header presence and correctness

gotchas_discovered.description: Language preference persistence relies on localStorage implementation; clearing storage affects behavior
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Documentation includes note about localStorage key (i18nextLng) and persistence behavior

gotchas_discovered.description: Material-UI components may not automatically adapt to RTL without proper theme configuration
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Manual testing checklist includes specific checks for component behavior in RTL

gotchas_discovered.description: E2E tests require both backend (port 8000) and frontend (port 3000) running simultaneously
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Prerequisites section clearly documents required setup and ports
